name: Bill Ready

name: Bill Ready
text: We've been named to @FortuneMagazine's #Fortune500 list at #204, up 103 spots since we debuted on the list in 2016.//t.co/gQi36GEAov

name: Bill Ready
text: At @PayPal, we see that sellers who sell on more than just one platform experience 3 times the growth of those who sell in only one place. Important context for SMBs, especially w/ intro of great new selling forums like Instagram & Facebook Marketplace //t.co/cnZ5WP4A3c

name: Bill Ready
text: Grit & tenacity are among the most important traits in a leader. It can come in many forms and from many places. Having worked with @jmacoaching for years, I know she has it in spades and she knows how to help others tap into theirs.//t.co/urYdXC9YkT

name: Bill Ready
text: Lots of big news out of Facebook F8, particularly for their Marketplace where buyers and sellers can now complete transactions directly in FB Marketplace without leaving. Quite impactful for buyers and sellers & built on @PayPal's marketplace platform.//t.co/urryBB0GSe

name: Bill Ready
text: iZettle and PayPal share the belief in the power of small businesses, they're the backbone of the economy. Today's news isn't just a step in the right direction for us, but for small businesses around the world.//t.co/jhfw9s5qtu//t.co/ohFeT5UabH

name: Bill Ready
text: @mdudas It's been an amazing run!! Was great to have you as part of that early team that set the foundation for so much of what was to come.

name: Bill Ready
text: We continue to grow with our marketplace partners. In the last 12 months, $90B of TPV came from our top 20 marketplaces and partners, growing nearly 40% YoY.//t.co/ronbw7BjFm $PYPL//t.co/kQaZWfB7ec

name: Bill Ready
text: We continue to make it simple and safe to send and receive money from friends and family. In Q1 total P2P volume across @PayPal, @venmo, and @Xoom was $42B, an increase of 41% YoY.//t.co/ronbw7BjFm $PYPL

name: Bill Ready
text: Venmo continues to be an important way for millennials to pay. In Q1, @Venmo processed $21B in payment volume, up 73% YoY. We ended Q1 with over 40M people using Venmo.//t.co/ronbw7BjFm $PYPL//t.co/vMpoPSqUwL

name: Bill Ready
text: One Touch, with 136 million consumers and 12.1 million merchants remains the clear market leader at checkout, with almost two times the conversion of competing wallets.//t.co/ronbw7BjFm $PYPL//t.co/UI2sghtPkp

name: Bill Ready
text: We announced $PYPL results for Q1 today. The team is introducing groundbreaking payment experiences and expanding relationships with partners like @instagram to drive the business forward. Here are some of the things I'm most proud of from the quarter:

name: Bill Ready
text: As part of my series of interviews with @PayPal's #smallbusiness customers, we spoke with @hughandcrye founder @vora about what has driven his company's success.//t.co/lfmn0FzDkd//t.co/zcQKrwhsy9

name: Bill Ready
text: @ElliotTurn Thanks Elliot!

name: Bill Ready
text: Tech has sped up access to most things, but it's made getting access to money slower. Today, we're introducing Instant Transfer to bank, through our partnership w/ @JPMorgan, so customers can instantly transfer their balance w/ @PayPal to eligible accounts//t.co/MwSVnACTwE

name: Bill Ready
text: For International Women's Day, we spoke with some of the inspiring women entrepreneurs & small biz owners we work with to hear their stories. Read how @BraveCollection founder Jessica Hendricks Yee created a business that empowers women globally. #IWD2019//t.co/uwcRHP1W70//t.co/8mXl3430ov

name: Bill Ready
text: I spoke w/NBC's @SRuhle about the evolving workforce & how there's been an explosion of online forums where small businesses can sell. Small biz selling w/ @PayPal across multiple channels grow nearly 3X faster than those selling on just 1 marketplace.//t.co/1yU9bfILqW

name: Bill Ready
text: New strategic partnership b/w @PayPal & @PaymentusCorp! PayPal will enable payment processing for Paymentus transactions & enable PayPal, Venmo & PayPal Credit payment options & more for businesses. We'll leverage the Paymentus platform to enable bill pay in the PayPal app. $PYPL//t.co/KXtJgUHQB0

name: Bill Ready
text: Small businesses selling with @PayPal across a variety of channels grow nearly 3X faster than those selling on just one marketplace. In 2018, we saw ~$85B in TPV from our top 20 partners and marketplaces, growing 41% yoy. $PYPL//t.co/sGaikG5N4o

name: Bill Ready
text: .@Braintree has continued impressive growth. Last month we shared Braintree's platform has processed $500B+ in auth. payment vol. since 9/2013 & more than 6B txns in 2018, thanks to our growing customers, which include Krispy Kreme, Live Nation/Ticketmaster & Deutsche Post. $PYPL//t.co/aVuKniqhLU

name: Bill Ready
text: In Q4, @Venmo processed a record ~$19B in payment volume, up 80% yoy. Venmo exited 2018 on a $200M+ annual revenue run rate. And 29% of Venmo users have now engaged in a monetizable action. $PYPL//t.co/r4sRsnC2pT

name: Bill Ready
text: .@PayPal's One Touch now has 123M+ consumers opted in & 11M+ merchants accepting it. With One Touch, we're democratizing access to push button buying on mobile. $PYPL//t.co/AzJm7rP1ki

name: Bill Ready
text: Mobile continues to drive @PayPal's growth. With $67B of mobile TPV in Q4, up 40% yoy, #mobile now represents 41% of PayPal's total TPV. $PYPL

name: Bill Ready

name: Bill Ready

name: Bill Ready
text: The potential to work together to revamp the infrastructure & increase access to the digital economy has never been greater. Over the past 2+ years, @PayPal has forged 40+ partnerships. Together, we can build & democratize access seamless commerce experiences. #Money2020

name: Bill Ready
text: Businesses of all sizes should have access to the tools that let them thrive in their local & broader communities. They can do that if we come together & create solutions that increase access and level the playing field for businesses of all sizes. #Money2020

name: Bill Ready
text: Today's financial infrastructure wasn't designed for small biz. >50% of small biz are locked in the physical world yet 48% of consumers would consider not buying from a biz if it didn't have a website. Small biz are missing out on opportunities to reach customers. #Money2020

name: Bill Ready
text: Although technology has made getting access to global customers faster, it's made getting access to money slower for businesses. Technology should make it easier to get your money, not harder. @PayPal is working to solve this with solutions like Funds Now. #Money2020

name: Bill Ready
text: The digital economy has created tremendous opportunities, but the benefits of digitization haven't been evenly distributed. You see this everyday with retailers going bankrupt & storefronts closing. What's less visible is small businesses are hurting just as badly. #Money2020

name: Bill Ready
text: Small businesses are the backbone of our economy. There are ~30M small businesses in the US & many tens of millions more globally. Those small businesses account for over 60% of job growth & are truly the engine of our economy. #Money2020//t.co/iNtrxnQCuQ

name: Bill Ready
text: For those not at #Money2020, sharing what I spoke about, as it's a topic I care deeply about: How our industry can help small businesses thrive in the digital econ by working more closely together. Watch part of my keynote here & look out for more posts://t.co/OijVeVtVxL//t.co/rsBtQt7Yz7

name: Bill Ready
text: For those at #Money2020, I'll be giving a keynote today on how the industry can partner together to increase access for small businesses the drivers of jobs, innovation & diversity & help bring them into the digital economy. Join @ Revolution Stage/Venetian ballroom, 4:05pm.

name: Bill Ready
text: .@PayPal is sponsoring the #Money2020 hackathon! If you're attending, check out PayPal's challenge & build solutions to help people/businesses participate in the digital economy. We'll award 3 winning teams a total of $25K! Come build with us & help us power the next-gen economy!

name: Bill Ready

name: Bill Ready

name: Bill Ready
text: Largest growth quarter ever for @Venmo! In Q3, Venmo processed $16.7B, up 78% yoy w/an annualized run rate approaching $70B. And a new record for net new active users. Over 24% of Venmo users have now engaged in a monetizable action; up from 17% one quarter ago. $PYPL//t.co/GfWlkXDKtN
